title: graph of lnxsinx, accum function g(x): abs min

content.question: For <math> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo><</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mi>π</mi> </mrow> </math> find the value of x at which g has an absolute minimum. Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema
